title: Embodied Learning Strategies for Pre-Reading Skill Acquisition in Early Childhood

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of early childhood developmental stages, basic reading instruction theories, and experience in educational program design
context.additional_context: A course conducted in a mobile-based microlearning environment for current professionals (early childhood education specialists). Focuses on designing physical-integrated learning activities using digital devices (tablets/smartphones).

learning_goals: Can explain five or more pre-reading skill activity designs utilizing physical movement
Can develop digitally integrated embodied learning scenarios
Can suggest three or more differentiated strategies for young children with varying reading levels
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
